Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • Room
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Building block for the map. Contains Things Note: all exit labels are case sensitive.

    • Constructor Summary

      Room(java.lang.String description)

      • getContents

        public java.util.List<Thing> getContents()
        What Things are in this Room?
        Returns:
        Non-modifiable List of Things in the Room

      • addExit

        public void addExit(java.lang.String name,
                    Room target)
             throws ExitExistsException,
                    NullRoomException
        Add a new exit to this Room.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the exit
        target - Room the exit goes to
        Throws:
        ExitExistsException - if the room already has an exit of that name
        NullRoomException - if target is null

      • removeExit

        public void removeExit(java.lang.String name)
        Remove an exit from this Room Note: silently fails if exit does not exist.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of exit to remove

      • enter

        public void enter(Thing item)
        Add Thing to this Room.
        Parameters:
        item - Thing to add

      • leave

        public boolean leave(Thing item)
        Remove item from Room. Note: will fail if item is not in the Room or if something wants to fight item.
        Parameters:
        item - Thing to remove
        Returns:
        true if removal was successful

      • makeExitPair

        public static void makeExitPair(Room room1,
                                Room room2,
                                java.lang.String label1,
                                java.lang.String label2)
                         throws ExitExistsException,
                                NullRoomException
        Connects two rooms both ways. Note: either both exits are created or neither are.
        Parameters:
        room1 - First room
        room2 - Second room
        label1 - Name of exit which goes from room1 to room2
        label2 - Name of exit which goes from room2 to room1
        Throws:
        ExitExistsException - if one or more of the exit labels are in use
        NullRoomException - if either room1 or room2 is null
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if either label is null
